title: Tech Meetup
description: A casual gathering of developers, engineers, and tech enthusiasts to share ideas and network.

title: Startup Pitch
description: Early-stage startups pitch their ideas to investors and mentors. Open Q&A and feedback sessions included.

title: AI Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop covering NLP, computer vision, and model deployment using Python and TensorFlow.

title: Design Sprint
description: A 5-hour sprint to prototype and test design ideas. Ideal for UX/UI designers and product thinkers.

title: Networking Night
description: An informal evening to connect with professionals across tech, design, and business domains.

title: Hackathon
description: 24-hour coding challenge with prizes for best innovation, design, and execution. Open to all skill levels.
